name: Orthopedic Football
description:
2 Player game in same keyboard! Try to score 10 goals against your friend! ** Features **
  • Outstanding graphics!
  • Endless replayability
  • Polished controls
  • No AI


** Controls **

Player 1: Arrow keys
Player 2: W,A,S,D


Goals can be pushed! Play as nasty as you can!! There is no rules!!!
